column4: i thought my computer had CRASHED.. but my nick is still online so it's working :)
Nicks tend to take a while to time out so it may still be crashed :(
it locked up open office about two hours ago, what I have now is a black screen with a moving mouse arrow.
Can you get to a tty?
ctrl+alt+F1 to get to a terminal ( ctrl+alt+F7 to return to GUI )
control alt f1 got me to a Starting up Ubuntu 6:10 startup, control alt f7 does nothing .. did f1 restart it??
Is the last thing it says "login:" ?
Enter your username and hit return, it will then ask you for your password
ok now a propmt .. but i'm still online with chalcedony from that box
What program do you think is crashed? You can run "top" to see what processes are using the most CPU and "killall <program name> to quit a program
is there something to tell if Open Office is still running? i'm fairly sure it did something naughty.
robbie's command got me two lines.. yours got me a whole page of repreats!
robbie's command got me two lines.. yours got me a whole page of stuff.. how to kill openoffice?
